trans-unit.source: Defines an object that knows how to invoke a command.
trans-unit.target: Definerer et objekt som vet hvordan å aktivere en kommando.

trans-unit.source: The command source defines how a command is invoked by that particular object.
trans-unit.target: Kommandoen kilden definerer hvordan en kommando aktiveres ved at bestemt objekt.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> is associated with a command, the command is invoked when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>er knyttet til en kommando, kommandoen aktiveres når det <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>klikkes.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>

trans-unit.source: A command source will normally disable itself if the command it is associated with cannot execute on the current command target.
trans-unit.target: Kommandokilde deaktiverer vanligvis seg selv om den er knyttet til kommandoen ikke kan kjøre på gjeldende kommando mål.

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Paste%2A> command will gray itself out when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Paste%2A> command cannot execute on the current command target.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>knyttet til den <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Paste%2A>kommandoen grå selve ut når den <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Paste%2A>kommandoen kan ikke kjøre på gjeldende kommando mål.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Paste%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Paste%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: Normally, a command source will listen to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged> event on the command.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis Kommandokilde lytter til den <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged>hendelse på kommandoen.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged>

trans-unit.source: This informs the command source when conditions change on the command target, such as loss of keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Dette informerer kilden kommandoen når betingelser endre på kommandoen målet, for eksempel tap av tastaturfokus.

trans-unit.source: The command source can then query the command using the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecute%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Kommandoen kilden kan deretter spør kommandoen ved hjelp av den <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecute%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecute%2A>

trans-unit.source: Some of the classes in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] that implement ICommandSource are: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>, and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink>.
trans-unit.target: Noen av klassene i [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] som Implementer ICommandSource er: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem>, og <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Hyperlink> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuItem> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>

trans-unit.source: In the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] commanding system, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.CommandTarget%2A> property on a ICommandSource is only applicable when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> is a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
trans-unit.target: I de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] tiltrekker seg system den <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.CommandTarget%2A>egenskap i en ICommandSource gjelder bare når <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>er <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> </xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.CommandTarget%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.CommandTarget%2A> is set on a ICommandSource and the corresponding command is not a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, the command target is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.CommandTarget%2A>er angitt for en ICommandSource og tilsvarende kommando er ikke en <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, målet kommandoen ignoreres.</xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.CommandTarget%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the command that will be executed when the command source is invoked.
trans-unit.target: Henter kommandoen som utføres når kommandoen kilden startes.

trans-unit.source: The command that will be executed when the command source is invoked.
trans-unit.target: Kommandoen som utføres når kommandoen kilden startes.

trans-unit.source: Represents a user defined data value that can be passed to the command when it is executed.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en brukerdefinert dataverdi som kan sendes til kommandoen når den kjøres.

trans-unit.source: Normally, the CommandParameter is used to pass specific information to the command when it is executed.
trans-unit.target: CommandParameter brukes vanligvis til å sende spesifikk informasjon for kommandoen når den kjøres.

trans-unit.source: The type of the data is defined by the command.
trans-unit.target: Typen data er definert av kommandoen.

trans-unit.source: The command specific data.
trans-unit.target: Kommandoen bestemte data.

trans-unit.source: The object that the command is being executed on.
trans-unit.target: Objektet kommandoen som kjøres på.

trans-unit.source: In the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] commanding system, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.CommandTarget%2A> property on a <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource> is only applicable when the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> is a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.
trans-unit.target: I de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_wpf](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-wpf-md.md)] tiltrekker seg system den <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.CommandTarget%2A>egenskap i en <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>gjelder bare når <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand>er <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource> </xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.CommandTarget%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.CommandTarget%2A> is set on a <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource> and the corresponding command is not a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, the command target is ignored.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.CommandTarget%2A>er angitt for en <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource>og tilsvarende kommando er ikke en <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, målet kommandoen ignoreres.</xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> </xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommandSource> </xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding.CommandTarget%2A>

trans-unit.source: When used with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, the command target is the object on which the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute> events are raised.
trans-unit.target: Når det brukes med en <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>, kommandoen målet er objektet som den <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed>og <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute>hendelser registreres.</xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.CanExecute> </xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandManager.Executed> </xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>

trans-unit.source: If the CommandTarget property is not set, the element with keyboard focus will be used as the target.
trans-unit.target: Hvis egenskapen CommandTarget ikke er angitt, brukes elementet med tastaturfokus som mål.

trans-unit.source: The object that the command is being executed on.
trans-unit.target: Objektet kommandoen som kjøres på.
